function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate adaptation of clinical technology to WBE","Impact":"Inaccurate detection of viruses in wastewaters, leading to potential spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Further development and adaptation of technology for wastewater measurements, specifically for virus detection","Technologies":"LOC/POC, biosensors, paper-based sensors, smartphone-based biosensors","People":"Public health officials, wastewater treatment plant operators","Owner":"Technology developers, wastewater treatment plant operators"},{"Description":"Small market size for environmental biosensors","Impact":"Limited mass production of biosensor units for wastewater treatment plants (WWTPs) globally","Mitigation":"Collaboration and partnerships between water authorities, technology developers, and government agencies to support the development and production of environmental biosensors","Technologies":"Collaborative research and development efforts, government funding support","People":"Technology developers, water authorities, government agencies","Owner":"Water authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of optimization in wastewater treatment technology for virus transmission control","Impact":"Potential failure to control viral content in wastewater, leading to increased risk of virus transmission","Mitigation":"Research and development to optimize wastewater treatment technology for virus transmission control, analogies with previous outbreaks (SARS, MERS) for insights","Technologies":"Enhanced wastewater treatment technology, research-based insights from previous viral outbreaks","People":"Water utilities, water authorities, public health officials","Owner":"Water utilities, water authorities, research institutions"}]}
